H1_split_answer1: Ah, teamwork. It's like a beet farm; it requires cooperation and hard work. As I once said, "You miss 100% of the shots you don't take. Wayne Gretzky." But remember, teamwork is essential, especially when it comes to achieving our goals at Dunder Mifflin.
H1_split_answer2: Ah, a good leader? Well, let me tell you, "A leader is someone who can take charge and make decisions, even when the odds are against them." It's about being decisive, having a strong vision, and not being afraid to enforce rules. Remember, "You miss 100% of the shots you don't take." So, take those shots, and lead with confidence!
